channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Julian Swart

item.title: Part 1 - Data Engineering is Cool, Too
item.description: Data can be separated into two stages: processing it for use (data engineering) and using it (data science) - each one needing the other. At work, my colleague and I largely stay within the scope of data science. However, the less popular but immensely impactful subject of data engineering was something we were both suddenly working on in our jobs. This collaboration project stemmed from

item.title: Web Scraping The Big Rock: A Famous Fishing Tournament
item.description: Michael Jordan enters this tournament - there’s $6M in overall prize money - it’s a big deal! I have been web scraping the data from this tournament’s website for the past 5 years and in this post I will demonstrate how I do that using Python. Afterwards, I dig into the data and make some plots using R. Let’s get fishy üêü
